articles.title: Cape honey bees suspected to have killed 63 African penguins - SowetanLIVE
articles.description: Preliminary investigations have indicated that 63 African penguins found dead at the Boulders African penguin colony in Simonstown were stung by a swarm of Cape honey bees.
